mapper.insert: insert into t_material_quota (material_code, supplier_code, supplier_name, material_quota, data_role_at, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, is_delete, version) values (#{materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialQuota,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataRoleAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_material_quota
material_code,
supplier_code,
supplier_name,
material_quota,
data_role_at,
create_user,
create_time,

insert into t_material_quota ( material_code, supplier_code, supplier_name, material_quota, data_role_at, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, is_delete, version) values
( #{item.materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.materialQuota,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.dataRoleAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%m%S'), #{item.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.version,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

update.foreach:
update t_material_quota
material_code = #{item.materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_code = #{item.supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_name = #{item.supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_quota = #{item.materialQuota,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
data_role_at = #{item.dataRoleAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{item.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{item.version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%m%S')
where material_code = #{item.materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND supplier_code = #{item.supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
